ActPublic Service Staff Relations Act
PrecisApproval for STATISTICS SURVEY OPERATIONS to enter into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PUBLIC SERVICE ALLIANCE OF CANADA which is applicable to all Interviewers and Senior Interviewers working primarily in Statistics Canada Regional Offices, with an expiry date of November 30, 2004.
